k23b.sa.BlockingQueue

Class WaitNotifyQueue<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • k23b.sa.BlockingQueue.WaitNotifyQueue<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBlockingQueue<E>

    public class WaitNotifyQueue<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBlockingQueue<E>
    Includes an unsynchronized queue where the synchronized put and get are done using wait and notify calls

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitNotifyQueue(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs an empty queue with no maximum capacity
      WaitNotifyQueue(java.lang.String name, int maxSize)
      Constructs an empty queue with the specified maximum capacity

      • put

        public void put(E item)
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IBlockingQueue
        Inserts an element into the queue. If the size of the queue is equal to the potentially max size, then the call waits until a get call
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        item - element to be inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting

      • get

        public E get()
      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IBlockingQueue
        Returns and removes the first element of the queue. If there is none, then the call blocks and it waits until a put call
        Specified by:

        Description copied from interface: IBlockingQueue
